categories: Category:Battles of the Jedi Civil War

nodes.text: The Ahto Uprising was a battle that took place in Ahto City on the planet Manaan after the Jedi Order and Galactic Republic defeated the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Malak's Sith Empire at the end of the Jedi Civil War. The battle was fought between Force-sensitive adepts allied with the Selkath female Shasa's Order, and the remaining Sith forces on Ahto City. The Shasan adepts successfully defeated the Sith that served Malak, who was killed by the former Sith Lord and redeemed Jedi Knight Revan.

The Ahto Uprising was first mentioned in the third part of the Planet Hoppers article Manaan: Depths of History, written by Cory J. Herndon and published by Wizards of the Coast in February 2004. A image depicting the Selkath female Shasa fighting a Sith trooper during the Ahto Uprising was released in the Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide.
